summary: This tag encompasses the evolving concept of ecosystems, extending beyond its biological origins to describe modern, organic, non-hierarchical organizational structures in tech and business. Highlights include the intersection of design and biological principles, as well as profiles of influential leaders like Jan Hein Hoogstad who are innovating in this space.
excerpt: The term ecosystem once bound to biological context is now used to describe distributed, non-hierarchical human organizations, reflecting a shift in how we envisage collective structures.
